thread.title: Cooling towers blamed for Legionnaires' disease at California prison
thread.title_full: Cooling towers blamed for Legionnaires' disease at California prison

title: Cooling towers blamed for Legionnaires' disease at California prison
text:
Published By: Fox News: Health - Today 
Dirty cooling towers were to blame for an outbreak of Legionnaires' disease that has sickened dozens of inmates and at least four employees ...
